portfolio.title: Case Studies
portfolio.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've delivered for clients with measurable results

notificationCenter.title: Notification Center
notificationCenter.problem: Needed scalable cloud-based alerting system for multiple teams and services
notificationCenter.solution: Built notification microservice with Scala, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, and ArgoCD with sophisticated alerting logic
notificationCenter.result: Reduced downtime by 35%, enabled realtime alerts for 500+ users across the organization

awsMigration.title: AWS Infrastructure Migration
awsMigration.problem: Costly monolithic architecture with security vulnerabilities and limited scalability
awsMigration.solution: Migrated to AWS with IaC (Terraform), CI/CD via GitLab, managed 500+ developers' cloud access
awsMigration.result: Cut AWS costs by 20%, boosted deployment speed by 3x, improved security posture

fleetexecutor.title: Fleetexecutor Map Portal
fleetexecutor.problem: Needed real-time monitoring system for automated guided vehicles (AGVs)
fleetexecutor.solution: Led design and development of map portal using React, AWS, and real-time data processing
fleetexecutor.result: Enabled real-time monitoring of fleet operations, improving efficiency and response times

devDash.title: DevDash: Developer Dashboard CLI
devDash.description: A CLI tool for monitoring and managing developer resources. DevDash integrates with GitHub, Jenkins, GitLab, and Kubernetes to efficiently manage CI/CD pipelines and resources.
